text: Save the Drowning Man () is a 1967 Soviet comedy movie directed by Pavel Arsenov.СПАСИТЕ УТОПАЮЩЕГО It stars Andrei Ushakov, Leonid Karasyov, and Egor Dyakov. == Actors == * Andrei Ushakov as Andrei Vasilkov * Leonid Karasyov as Gulka * Egor Dyakov as Podushkin * Vladimir Bobylyov * Vladimir Varenov * Anna Ratnikova * Yuri Solodov == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1967 movies Category:Soviet comedy movies
title: Save the Drowning Man
